channel.title: 笔记 on 么了's 博客

item.title: 全图片页面css逐行淡入渲染
item.description: 判断页面模版， template=1一行一图， template=2一行二图 <div class="fadeIn" v-for="(item,i) in list" :key="i" :style="i%2&&template==='2'?`${'animation-delay:'+i*100+'ms;'}`:`${'animation-delay:'+(i+1)*100+'ms;'}`" > <img :src="item.imgUrl" alt="" /> </div> img { width:100%; height:100%; } .fadeIn { opacity: 0; animation: fadeIn .2s ease-in 1 forwards; } @keyframes fadeIn { 0% {opacity: 0;} 100% {opacity: 1;} }
